original_text: Then Jonathan made a covenant with David, because he loved him as his own soul.
korean_text: 요나단은 다윗을 자기 생명 같이 사랑하여 더불어 언약을 맺었으며

sentences.original_text: Then Jonathan made a covenant with David
because he loved him as his own soul.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자기 영혼같이 그를 사랑했기 때문입니다
